Attacks.Name: Shadow Blast
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Shadow Lugia gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Hex special condition.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage and gain the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psychic Crush
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Slow and Stagger special conditions. After this attack is resolved, Shadow Lugia may advance M.

Superpowers.Name: Shadow Shield
Superpowers.Effect: The first time Shadow Lugia would suffer damage each round, reduce the damage suffered by 2.

Superpowers.Name: Dark Ascent
Superpowers.Effect: Place Shadow Lugia within Range 3 of its current location. After being placed, enemy characters within Range 2 gain the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Shadow Purge
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target character is Staggered. Additionally, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Dark Recovery
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Shadow Lugia. After using this superpower, Shadow Lugia gains the Hex special condition.
